Text: And if i remember right, full page colour pics of many mr olympias. The sergio oliva pic in particular is awesome.
Yes, the book contains the Hall of fame section. All the pages in this pdf are b&w, but yes, it contains the awesome picture of Sergio Oliva as well :)
I have the paperback version of this, and all of the pictures are black and white. I'm not sure if the hardcover version is any different.
